 High quality Tea set given to Loyalty member in 2013 1. Eligibility: Loyalty individual members who rank Diamond or Gold, are promoted due to accumulating points, have updated information and membership card, was born in 1980 and before 1980. Priority for members who have not received physical present for the CMSN program. 2. Content: 01 tea set including 3 octagonal boxes containing 3 types of tea: Thiết quan âm, Oolong and Trà búp nõn tôm. Each octagonal box contains 10 vacuumed sachets with the net weight of 8gr each. The set of 3 octagonal boxes of tea is contained in a rectangular box, and a bag. The gift box and bag have MobiFone logo printed on them. Product is attached with origin confirmation. Center 2: ĐTV enter FB of customers about the present (if any) to CN HCM1. Staff will deliver presents at the customers' address. 3. Quanity: Center Quanity 1 160 Each center contacts and deliver presents to the eligible customers who are under the management of that center Finish delivering present before 31st December, 2013. Center 2: HCM1 branch will deliver the presents 2 120 3 70 4 60 5 60 6 60 4 . logo MobiFone &#6037;&#6043;&#6071;&#6031;&#6037;&#6043;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6016;&#6035;&#6098;&#6043;&#6082;&#6020;&#6037;&#6043;&#6071;&#6031;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041;&#6100;
